mapper.delete: delete from PBCRS_REPORT_ENSECACCMDFBSSGMT where BSSGMTSEQNO = #{BsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MDFCSGMTCODE =#{MdfcSgmtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ENSECACCMDFBSSGMT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODRECCODE = #{ModRecCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATE = #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCTTYPE = #{AcctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MDFCSGMTCODE = #{MdfcSgmtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BSSGMTSEQNO = #{BsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select BSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, MODRECCODE, RPTDATE, ACCTTYPE, MDFCSGMTCODE from PBCRS_REPORT_ENSECACCMDFBSSGMT
